text.english: Teorema: \(\texttt{rev}\) of \(\texttt{app}\) equals \(\texttt{app}\) of \(\texttt{rev}\), i.e. \[ \forall l_1\;l_2 \in L_A . \; \texttt{rev}(\texttt{app}(l_1\; l_2)) = \texttt{app}(\texttt{rev}(l_2), \texttt{rev}(l_1\;) \]
text.italiano: Teorema: \(\texttt{rev}\) di \(\texttt{app}\) equivale a \(\texttt{app}\) di \(\texttt{rev}\), i.e. \[ \forall l_1\;l_2 \in L_A . \; \texttt{rev}(\texttt{app}(l_1\; l_2)) = app(\texttt{rev}(l_2), \texttt{rev}(l_1\;) \]

theorem.coq: Theorem rev_app : forall l1 l2 : list , rev(app l1 l2) = app (rev l2) (rev l1).
